title: libtorch.so.1: undefined symbol:
body_html:
when I install from source, I got error like this after import torch：

File "", line 1, in
File "/home/luhongchao/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 84, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libtorch.so.1: undefined symbol: _ZTIN2at4TypeE

I installed then use : pip install torch, but also got error:

File "anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 80, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so: undefined symbol: _ZTI24THRefcountedMapAllocator

anyone encountered it?
body_text:
when I install from source, I got error like this after import torch：
File "", line 1, in

I installed then  use : pip install torch, but also got error:
File "anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 80, in 
from torch._C import *
ImportError: anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so: undefined symbol: _ZTI24THRefcountedMapAllocator
anyone encountered it?
body:
when I install from source, I got error like this after import torch：  

  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/luhongchao/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 84, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libtorch.so.1: undefined symbol: _ZTIN2at4TypeE

I installed then  use : pip install torch, but also got error:

File "anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 80, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so: undefined symbol: _ZTI24THRefcountedMapAllocator

 anyone encountered it?
